name: FireFighters
description:
Made By Mr.Lonely

Game Identity / Mantra: 

A 2 player action platformer where the players shoot fire at each other.

Design Pillars:

Fast. Action Packed. Fun.

Genre/Story/Mechanics Summary:

A game where there are 2 players fighting for 30 seconds with fireballs.

Features: 

Unlimited ammo/FireBalls.

Interface: 

Player one: A=Left  D=Right  B=Jump  N=Throw  Player two: LeftArrow=Left  RightArrow=Right  1 on depad=Jump  2 on depad=Throw

Art Style: 

A 16 bit style but with modern colors.

Music/Sound: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ciCJ43nQdRg : Music by Kevin MacLeod = Delightful D

Launch Criteria: 

Platform: Itch.io        Audience: 7+ and all genders

Launch Day: Probably between 2021 Winter and 2021 Summer.
